markdownRemark.html:
Over the past few weeks a lot happened. I took some time off for vacations and spent a total of zero hours on the computer over the course of almost three weeks. The world has gotten a bit crazy since the last time I wrote (in case you read this in the future, we're living the covid-19 pandemic).

I spent my time off in the U.S. and was not expecting to back to the office for a couple of weeks, but it seems like everybody will be working from home for at least a couple of months. I feel silly about thinking of this website when I could be using my energy to do something with more purpose. At the same time I don't want to loose the focus and start working on something else right away. Let's see how this will evolve in the next few weeks.
